title: ExCALIBUR PROJECT NEPTUNE - FRAMEWORK
summary: Important conclusions from Day 1 of the ExCALIBUR PROJECT NEPTUNE include the production of process for developing open-source software, understanding limitations in university contributions to software development, and choosing the appropriate DSL. The project has achieved significant milestones, including the creation of 100 technical reports, 17 repositories, and updates to the Nektar ++ library.
